entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RahulGandhi Pappu Chacha, please do explain today atleast the COVID-19 test strategy while talking to these nurses. Last time, your strategy was so strategically aligned to the rational strategy that most of us failed to understand those strategy. Please do explain to us and all your Ghulams
